animation-delay.description: Specifies when the animation will start.

animation-direction.description: Specifies whether the animation should play in reverse on alternate cycles or not.

animation-duration.description: Specifies the number of seconds or milliseconds an animation should take to complete one cycle.

animation-fill-mode.description: Specifies how a CSS animation should apply styles to its target before and after it is executing.

animation-iteration-count.description: Specifies the number of times an animation cycle should be played before stopping.

animation-name.description: Specifies the name of @keyframes defined animations that should be applied to the selected element.

animation-play-state.description: Specifies whether the animation is running or paused.

animation-timing-function.description: Specifies how a CSS animation should progress over the duration of each cycle.

background.description: Defines a variety of background properties within one declaration.

background-attachment.description: Specify whether the background image is fixed in the viewport or scrolls.

background-clip.description: Specifies the painting area of the background.

background-origin.description: Specifies the positioning area of the background images.

background-position.description: Defines the origin of a background image.

background-repeat.description: Specify whether/how the background image is tiled.

background-size.description: Specifies the size of the background images.

border.description: Sets the width, style, and color for all four sides of an element's border.

border-bottom.description: Sets the width, style, and color of the bottom border of an element.

border-bottom-color.description: Sets the color of the bottom border of an element.

border-bottom-left-radius.description: Defines the shape of the bottom-left border corner of an element.

border-bottom-right-radius.description: Defines the shape of the bottom-right border corner of an element.

border-bottom-style.description: Sets the style of the bottom border of an element.

border-bottom-width.description: Sets the width of the bottom border of an element.

border-color.description: Sets the color of the border on all the four sides of an element.

border-image.description: Specifies how an image is to be used in place of the border styles.

border-image-outset.description: Specifies the amount by which the border image area extends beyond the border box.

border-image-repeat.description: Specifies whether the image-border should be repeated, rounded or stretched.

border-image-slice.description: Specifies the inward offsets of the image-border.

border-image-source.description: Specifies the location of the image to be used as a border.

border-image-width.description: Specifies the width of the image-border.

border-left.description: Sets the width, style, and color of the left border of an element.

border-left-color.description: Sets the color of the left border of an element.

border-left-style.description: Sets the style of the left border of an element.

border-left-width.description: Sets the width of the left border of an element.

border-radius.description: Defines the shape of the border corners of an element.

border-right.description: Sets the width, style, and color of the right border of an element.

border-right-color.description: Sets the color of the right border of an element.

border-right-style.description: Sets the style of the right border of an element.

border-right-width.description: Sets the width of the right border of an element.

border-style.description: Sets the style of the border on all the four sides of an element.

border-top.description: Sets the width, style, and color of the top border of an element.

border-top-color.description: Sets the color of the top border of an element.

border-top-left-radius.description: Defines the shape of the top-left border corner of an element.

border-top-right-radius.description: Defines the shape of the top-right border corner of an element.

border-top-style.description: Sets the style of the top border of an element.

border-top-width.description: Sets the width of the top border of an element.

border-width.description: Sets the width of the border on all the four sides of an element.

color.description: Specify the color of the text of an element.

opacity.description: Specifies the transparency of an element.

height.description: Specify the height of an element.

max-height.description: Specify the maximum height of an element.

max-width.description: Specify the maximum width of an element.

min-height.description: Specify the minimum height of an element.

min-width.description: Specify the minimum width of an element.

width.description: Specify the width of an element.

quotes.description: Specifies quotation marks for embedded quotations.

counter-reset.description: Creates or resets one or more counters.

counter-increment.description: Increments one or more counter values.

align-content.description: Specifies the alignment of flexible container's items within the flex container.

align-items.description: Specifies the default alignment for items within the flex container.

align-self.description: Specifies the alignment for selected items within the flex container.

flex.description: Specifies the components of a flexible length.

flex-basis.description: Specifies the initial main size of the flex item.

flex-direction.description: Specifies the direction of the flexible items.

flex-flow.description: A shorthand property for the flex-direction and the flex-wrap properties.

flex-grow.description: Specifies how the flex item will grow relative to the other items inside the flex container.

flex-shrink.description: Specifies how the flex item will shrink relative to the other items inside the flex container.

flex-wrap.description: Specifies whether the flexible items should wrap or not.

justify-content.description: Specifies how flex items are aligned along the main axis of the flex container after any flexible lengths and auto margins have been resolved.

order.description: Specifies the order in which a flex items are displayed and laid out within a flex container.

font.description: Defines a variety of font properties within one declaration.

font-family.description: Defines a list of fonts for element.

font-size.description: Defines the font size for the text.

font-size-adjust.description: Preserves the readability of text when font fallback occurs.

font-stretch.description: Selects a normal, condensed, or expanded face from a font.

font-style.description: Defines the font style for the text.

font-weight.description: Specify the font weight of the text.

list-style.description: Defines the display style for a list and list elements.

list-style-image.description: Specifies the image to be used as a list-item marker.

list-style-position.description: Specifies the position of the list-item marker.

list-style-type.description: Specifies the marker style for a list-item.

margin.description: Sets the margin on all four sides of the element.

margin-bottom.description: Sets the bottom margin of the element.

margin-left.description: Sets the left margin of the element.

margin-right.description: Sets the right margin of the element.

margin-top.description: Sets the top margin of the element.

column-count.description: Specifies the number of columns in a multi-column element.

column-fill.description: Specifies how columns will be filled.

column-gap.description: Specifies the gap between the columns in a multi-column element.

column-rule.description: Specifies a straight line, or "rule", to be drawn between each column in a multi-column element.

column-rule-color.description: Specifies the color of the rules drawn between columns in a multi-column layout.

column-rule-style.description: Specifies the style of the rule drawn between the columns in a multi-column layout.

column-rule-width.description: Specifies the width of the rule drawn between the columns in a multi-column layout.

column-span.description: Specifies how many columns an element spans across in a multi-column layout.

column-width.description: Specifies the optimal width of the columns in a multi-column element.

columns.description: A shorthand property for setting column-width and column-count properties.

outline.description: Sets the width, style, and color for all four sides of an element's outline.

outline-color.description: Sets the color of the outline.

outline-offset.description: Set the space between an outline and the border edge of an element.

outline-style.description: Sets a style for an outline.

outline-width.description: Sets the width of the outline.

padding.description: Sets the padding on all four sides of the element.

padding-bottom.description: Sets the padding to the bottom side of an element.

padding-left.description: Sets the padding to the left side of an element.

padding-right.description: Sets the padding to the right side of an element.

padding-top.description: Sets the padding to the top side of an element.

page-break-after.description: Insert a page breaks after an element.

page-break-before.description: Insert a page breaks before an element.

page-break-inside.description: Insert a page breaks inside an element.

border-collapse.description: Specifies whether table cell borders are connected or separated.

border-spacing.description: Sets the spacing between the borders of adjacent table cells.

caption-side.description: Specify the position of table's caption.

empty-cells.description: Show or hide borders and backgrounds of empty table cells.

tab-size.description: Specifies the length of the tab character.

text-align.description: Sets the horizontal alignment of inline content.

text-align-last.description: Specifies how the last line of a block or a line right before a forced line break is aligned when text-align is justify.

text-decoration.description: Specifies the decoration added to text.

text-decoration-color.description: Specifies the color of the text-decoration-line.

text-decoration-line.description: Specifies what kind of line decorations are added to the element.

text-decoration-style.description: Specifies the style of the lines specified by the text-decoration-line property

text-indent.description: Indent the first line of text.

text-justify.description: Specifies the justification method to use when the text-align property is set to justify.

text-overflow.description: Specifies how the text content will be displayed, when it overflows the block containers.

text-shadow.description: Applies one or more shadows to the text content of an element.

text-transform.description: Transforms the case of the text.

line-height.description: Sets the height between lines of text.

vertical-align.description: Sets the vertical positioning of an element relative to the current text baseline.

letter-spacing.description: Sets the extra spacing between letters.

white-space.description: Specifies how white space inside the element is handled.

word-break.description: Specifies how to break lines within words.

word-wrap.description: Specifies whether to break words when the content overflows the boundaries of its container.

backface-visibility.description: Specifies whether or not the "back" side of a transformed element is visible when facing the user.

perspective.description: Defines the perspective from which all child elements of the object are viewed.

perspective-origin.description: Defines the origin (the vanishing point for the 3D space) for the perspective property.

transform.description: Applies a 2D or 3D transformation to an element.

transform-origin.description: Defines the origin of transformation for an element.

transform-style.description: Specifies how nested elements are rendered in 3D space.

transition.description: Defines the transition between two states of an element.

transition-delay.description: Specifies when the transition effect will start.

transition-duration.description: Specifies the number of seconds or milliseconds a transition effect should take to complete.

transition-property.description: Specifies the names of the CSS properties to which a transition effect should be applied.

transition-timing-function.description: Specifies the speed curve of the transition effect.

display.description: Specifies how an element is displayed onscreen.

position.description: Specifies how an element is positioned.

top.description: Specify the location of the top edge of the positioned element.

right.description: Specify the location of the right edge of the positioned element.

bottom.description: Specify the location of the bottom edge of the positioned element.

left.description: Specify the location of the left edge of the positioned element.

float.description: Specifies whether or not a box should float.

clear.description: Specifies the placement of an element in relation to floating elements.

z-index.description: Specifies a layering or stacking order for positioned elements.

overflow.description: Specifies the treatment of content that overflows the element's box.

overflow-x.description: Specifies how to manage the content when it overflows the width of the element's content area.

overflow-y.description: Specifies how to manage the content when it overflows the height of the element's content area.

resize.description: Specifies whether or not an element is resizable by the user.

visibility.description: Specifies whether or not an element is visible.

box-shadow.description: Applies one or more drop-shadows to the element's box.

box-sizing.description: Alter the default CSS box model.
